lessons.japanese: 君のようにわがままでは友達がいなくなるよ。
lessons.english: Your selfishness will lose you your friends.

lessons.japanese: 何でもわがままを通せると思ってはいけない。
lessons.english: You can't hope to have your own way in everything.

lessons.japanese: その子はどうしても自分のわがままを通そうとしている。
lessons.english: The boy will have his own way.

lessons.japanese: ケイトはいつもわがままを通そうとするので級友に人気がない。
lessons.english: Kate isn't popular among her classmates because she always tries to have her own way.
